2_16ruLucRLto6GhT1Zb3P8JVZzC48fxd9Cc.body: Use a USB external boot to see how you like it first.  For example you can use OpenSuse netinstall and install it on a USB.  I suggest a popular Linux because of the drivers (OpenSuse, Debian, etc).  Umbuntu gets most of their money from Microsoft.  Most laptops and computers nowadays are GigaPets ( https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gigapet) and the manufacturer can have a kill switch and burn some component.  I would take the risk but I'm a retired Assembly Programmer.

5_1PTaJe3LLeB5Pfxq8KjcpQSPcSK1PQqsQs.body: Real News, classifieds, tips, warnings, funnies, etc.   Buy a newspaper or get one free and see the sections.  Since this network is supposedly persistent and anonymous I suggest links to cut down on storage.  A good email service.  You are probably familiar with i2p so you can get your ideas from there.
